Desc.eng: We must open a detective agency in the future, when you are too old to fight and I'm still clever and beautiful.
Anyway… the thief who stole the stone woke up the Spirit of the Deep. Do you think the merchant did it?
Do you remember the stone we found in that abandoned camp? It looks like a perfect fit… and yes, it is! Case solved then, Miss Katarina.
It could have been him… or the butler did it. Do you want to ask the man?
We don't have time for that. I call forth the spirit and we destroy it.
We should search that abandoned campsite at the pathway. Something tells me that we'll find the stone there.
Playing the detective again? I'm impressed.
Look! One of old runestones is missing from the ring of the well. It seems...
